rows.label: tlk70000032_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah, if it isn't Prince Adel!
Nothing to report today, sir.

rows.label: tlk70000032_01_msg0002
rows.name:
I do have some gossip for you, though.
I've been listening to Nittle's complete
history of Iira.

rows.label: tlk70000032_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Did you know that this palace was
built by the combined efforts of
legions of humans and Blades alike?

rows.label: tlk70000032_01_msg0004
rows.name:
It was a time of unrest - Superbia
was leading the world into industrial
revolution, and conflict was rife.

rows.label: tlk70000032_01_msg0005
rows.name:
That's why this palace was built. As a
statement to people both at home and
abroad of what Iira stands for.

rows.label: tlk70000032_01_msg0006
rows.name:
It's a testament to the belief that by
working together, we can make up for
our flaws and enhance our strengths.

rows.label: tlk70000032_01_msg0007
rows.name:
Hearing that has increased my passion
for guarding the palace a hundredfold!
